import React from 'react' import './topnav.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Dropdown from '../dropdown/Dropdown' import ThemeMenu from '../thememenu/ThemeMenu' import user_image from '../../assets/images/user.png' import user_menu from '../../assets/JsonData/user_menus.json' const curr_user = { display_name: 'Kemal Demirel', image: user_image } const renderUserToggle = (user) => (
{user.display_name}
) const renderUserMenu =(item, index) => (
{item.content}
) const Topnav = () => { return (
{/* dropdown here */} renderUserToggle(curr_user)} contentData={user_menu} renderItems={(item, index) => renderUserMenu(item, index)} />
) } export default Topnav
